name: Jim
title: Writer
body: Art major with a love for Unix and all things exotic from software to hardware.
links: http://www.osnews.com/ :: OSNews http://www.skyos.org/ :: SkyOS http://www.nekochan.net/ :: IRIX hobbyist community http://www.kernel.org/ :: The home of Linux http://www.tomshardware.com/ :: Tom's Hardware Guide
os: Solaris, IRIX, Linux, Open/FreeBSD, BeOS, SkyOS, Mac, Win2k and below (some XP, but don't care for it), some playing with Hurd.
